headline: How a Marathon Petroleum Grant Empowered a Future Teacher of the Year
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / May 9, 2025 / Diashiki Snyder-Brown, a 7th grade math teacher at East St. John Preparatory School in LaPlace, Louisiana, is one of approximately 120 educators expected to benefit from the scholarship-like certification ...

headline: Marathon Petroleum Q1 Loss Narrower Than Expected, Revenues Beat
summary: MPC reports a loss for the first quarter due to its second-largest planned maintenance activity in the reported period.
